meanings.definition: The time between sunset and sunrise when it is dark outside.
meanings.sent1: During nighttime, the stars twinkle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I love to stargaze during nighttime.
meanings.sent3: At nighttime, the moon plays hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the universe reveal themselves during nighttime.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of nighttime is calming and peaceful.

meanings.definition: The period of darkness during the night.
meanings.sent1: The city lights create a beautiful glow during nighttime.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to sleep in complete darkness during nighttime.
meanings.sent3: During nighttime, the shadows seem to dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The mysteries of the forest come alive during nighttime.
meanings.sent5: The quiet of nighttime allows for deep reflection.
